```{r}
#| label: global_options
#| echo: false
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE)
options(error = recover)
```

```{r}
#| label: setup
library("tibble")
library("readr")
library("ggplot2")
library("GGally")
```

```{r}
#| label: read
x = readr::read_delim("counts.count.txt", col_types = c("cciiiiiii"))
```

```{r}
#| label: ggpairs
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 10
ggpairs(x[ , 3:9],
  upper = list(continuous = wrap("points", alpha = 1, size = 0.1)), 
  lower = list(continuous = wrap("points", alpha = 1, size = 0.1)), 
  combo = wrap("dot", alpha = 0.4, size=0.2)
  ) + scale_y_log10() + scale_x_log10() 
```
